scripts.api:py: poetry -C backend install && poetry -C backend run python -m app.scripts.migrate && poetry -C backend run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 3001
scripts.db:migrate: poetry -C backend install && poetry -C backend run python -m app.scripts.migrate
scripts.start: poetry -C backend install && poetry -C backend run python -m app.scripts.migrate && poetry -C backend run uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3001
